name: Rasputina
description:
'''Rasputina''' is an American [[rock music|rock]] band based in New York City, known for an unconventional music style, as well as a fascination with historical allegories and fashion, especially those pertaining to the [[Victorian era]].

The group is fronted by cellist/vocalist [[Melora Creager]], who writes the music and lyrics and creates art for the band's albums, singles, and website.
